locations.Ice Cavern Frozen Blue Rupee:
(Blue_Fire or (logic_ice_frozen_rupee and can_jumpslash)) or
                (logic_boomerang_boulders and can_use(Boomerang))

exits.Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe Room:
has_soul(Freezard) and here(is_adult or has_explosives or can_use(Dins_Fire)
                    or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))

locations.Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_hover
                or ((can_superslide or can_hess) and can_use(Hover_Boots))

exits.Ice Cavern Map Room:
((is_adult or (glitch_ice_ledges_child and can_groundjump)) and (Silver_Rupee_Ice_Cavern_Spinning_Scythe, 5))
                or (is_adult and can_lunge_storage)
exits.Ice Cavern Compass Room:
Blue_Fire or
                (is_adult and glitch_ledge_clip) or
                can_lunge_storage

locations.Ice Cavern Freestanding PoH:
Blue_Fire or (adv_ice_hp_no_bottle and
                    Bombs and can_shield and can_live_dmg(0.5,False) and is_adult)
                    or (logic_boomerang_boulders and can_use(Boomerang))

locations.Ice Cavern Push Block Room Red Rupee 1: (can_play(Song_of_Time) and is_adult) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_hover
locations.Ice Cavern Push Block Room Red Rupee 2: (can_play(Song_of_Time) and is_adult) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_hover
locations.Ice Cavern Push Block Room Red Rupee 3: (can_play(Song_of_Time) and is_adult) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_hover
locations.Ice Cavern GS Push Block Room:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or
                (logic_ice_block_gs and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or can_hover

locations.Ice Cavern Near End Pot 1: can_jumpslash or at('Ice Cavern End Room',True)
locations.Ice Cavern Near End Pot 2: can_jumpslash or at('Ice Cavern End Room',True)

exits.Ice Cavern End Room:
Blue_Fire or
                    (glitch_clipping and adv_hovers_recoil and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    can_mega or can_hess or can_superslide

exits.Ice Cavern End Hallway:
can_kill_wolfos and (
                can_mega or can_hess or (glitch_clipping and adv_hovers_recoil and can_use(Hover_Boots))
                or (has_soul(Freezard) and can_use(Hookshot))
                )
